official_title: A bill to permit the State of California to terminate the social security coverage of all members of the State employees retirement system except State legislators.

summary.text: Permits the State of California to terminate the social security coverage of all members of the State employees retirement system except State legislators.

titles.title: A bill to permit the State of California to terminate the social security coverage of all members of the State employees retirement system except State legislators.
